menus.name: Caesar Salad
menus.desc: Romaine lettuce tossed in our homemade caesar dressing, topped with garlic croutons and shaved parmesan cheese. Add grilled chicken,* grilled shrimp* or grilled salmon* for a little extra

menus.name: The Big Cheeseburger
menus.desc: Topped with your choice of three thick slices of american, monterey jack, cheddar or swiss cheese, served with crisp lettuce, vine-ripened tomato and red onion

menus.name: Veggie Leggie
menus.desc: Our grilled veggie leggie patty is topped with a grilled portobello mushroom, zucchini, yellow squash and roasted red pepper. Served on a toasted bun with mayo, leaf lettuce, sliced tomato and grilled sweet onions

menus.name: Hot Fudge Brownie
menus.desc: Ben & jerry's vanilla ice cream and hot fudge on a fresh homemade brownie, topped with chopped walnuts, chocolate sprinkles, fresh whipped cream and a cherry

menus.name: The Texan
menus.desc: Choice of hickory-smoked pulled pork or chicken with chipotle barbecue sauce, cheddar and monterey jack cheese, crispy fried jalape√±os and onions, piled high on toasted brioche. Go big (10-oz) for a little extra

menus.name: Honey Mustard Grilled Chicken Sandwich*
menus.desc: Toasted brioche bun with honey mustard, topped with smoked bacon, melted jack cheese, grilled chicken, dijon mayonnaise, iceberg lettuce and a slice of vine-ripened tomato

menus.name: Iced Caramel
menus.desc: Baileys irish cream, disaronno amaretto, monin salted caramel, shaken with half & half and topped with whipped cream and caramel sauce

menus.name: Chocolate Molten Cake
menus.desc: Dense, chocolaty cake with a lava-like center of rich, oozing molten chocolate. Served warm with vanilla ice cream

menus.name: Fiesta Burger*
menus.desc: Toasted brioche bun layered with roasted jalapeno salsa, melted jack cheese, freshly made guacamole, pico de gallo, crisp lettuce and vine-ripened tomato
